# Government Tender Announcement
## Ultrasonic Testing Phased Array RFP
### Tender Reference
* Tender Reference Number: WS4343727548
* Amendment Number: 0
* Solicitation Number: WS4343727548

### Closing Information
* Closing Date: December 28, 2023
* Closing Time: 14:00 EST

### Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Department of Natural Resources Canada, invites contractors to submit a proposal for the procurement of a new Ultrasonic Testing Phased Array Instrument and associated attachments/accessories. The goods will be used at the Hamilton Canmet MATERIALS (CMAT) facility for Phased Array certification candidate examination purposes.

### Goods and Services
The subject of this tender is to procure the following goods and services:
* Ultrasonic Testing Phased Array Instrument
* Associated attachments and accessories

* Category: Laboratory and Measuring and Observing and Testing Equipment
* Product Classification Manual (UNSPC) Code: *41000000, 41100000, 41110000

### Selection Criteria
Bidders will be evaluated based on the following criteria:
* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreement:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity
* None

### Regions of Delivery
* Hamilton

### Contracting Entity Information
The contracting entity for this tender is:
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, CANADA

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
* Darlene Keenan, Environmental Scientist, Public Services and Procurement Canada (SPAC/PSPC)
